insert into sso_org
id, parent_id, org_code, org_level, org_name, org_fix_code, org_sort, leader, phone, email, status, remark, tenant_id, create_by, create_time
select
#{id}, #{parentId}, CONCAT(pcode,LPAD(SUBSTR(IFNULL((SELECT max( org_code ) FROM sso_org WHERE parent_id = #{parentId} ), 0),(lvl-1)*5+1)+ 1, 5, 0 )), lvl, #{orgName}, #{orgFixCode}, #{orgSort}, #{leader}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{status}, #{remark}, #{tenantId}, #{createBy}, now()
from (select IFNULL(org_code,'') pcode,IFNULL(org_level,0)+1 lvl from (SELECT '' FROM dual) d left join sso_org on id = #{parentId}) t

sql.if: select * from (SELECT * FROM sso_org WHERE org_code LIKE (SELECT CONCAT(org_code,'%') FROM sso_org WHERE tenant_id = #{reqSsoOrg.tenantId})) sso_org

mapper.select:
select o.id,o.parent_id,o.tenant_id,o.org_fix_code,o.org_code,o.org_level,o.org_name,o.org_sort,o.leader ,o.phone,o.email,o.remark,o.status,o.del_flag,o.create_by,o.create_time,o.update_by,o.update_time , GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT r.id) roleIds from (
del_flag = 0
UNION
WHERE org_code IN (SELECT DISTINCT SUBSTR(org_code, 1,(org_level-#{value})*5) FROM sso_org
del_flag = 0
)
) o left join sso_org_role sor on o.id = sor.org_id left join sso_role r on sor.role_id = r.id and r.del_flag = 0 group by o.id,o.parent_id,o.tenant_id,o.org_fix_code,o.org_code,o.org_level,o.org_name,o.org_sort,o.leader ,o.phone,o.email,o.remark,o.status,o.del_flag,o.create_by,o.create_time,o.update_by,o.update_time order by o.org_sort
select count(0) from (SELECT * FROM sso_org WHERE org_code LIKE (SELECT CONCAT(org_code, '%') FROM sso_org WHERE tenant_id = #{tenantId})) sso_org where id = #{orgId}

select su.* from sso_user su inner JOIN sso_org_user sou on sou.user_id = su.id inner JOIN sso_org so on so.id = sou.org_id WHERE so.org_code like (select CONCAT(org_code, '%') from sso_org o where o.org_fix_code = #{code} and o.status=0 and o.del_flag=0 ) and su.del_flag = 0 and su.status = 0
and su.nickname like CONCAT('%',#{reqOrgUser.nickname},'%')
and su.account like CONCAT('%',#{reqOrgUser.account},'%')
and su.phone like CONCAT('%',#{reqOrgUser.phone},'%')

select id from sso_org where 1!=1
or org_code like CONCAT(#{code},'%')
order by org_sort
